about.title: About Service
about.faqDescription: Find answers to the most common questions about our service and its features. Learn how to use your subscription and enjoy discounts.
about.helpDescription: Get in touch with us if you have questions or suggestions. Our support team is ready to assist you promptly.
about.termsDescription: Read our terms of use and understand your rights and obligations as a user of our service.
about.billingDescription: Manage your subscription, view your billing history, and download invoices.
about.qrDescription: Recommendations for using QRs and links to our service to get your customers to join the service faster and support your business with subscriptions.
